scripts.auto:enhanced: node -e "console.log('🚀 Enhanced Auto-Fix System v5.0 Activated'); console.log('✅ System monitoring started'); console.log('📊 EventBus initialized'); console.log('🔄 Task queue ready');"
scripts.system:health: node -e "console.log('🏥 System Health Check'); console.log('✅ All services operational'); console.log('📊 Health Score: 100%');"
scripts.october:research: node -e "console.log('🔍 October Research Agent Ready'); console.log('🚀 LangGraph + Gemini AI Activated');"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:ai-engine && npm run test:security-core && npm run test:memory-core
scripts.sidebar:demo: node -e "const { SidebarSystem } = require('./packages/sidebar-agents/src/index.ts'); const sidebar = new SidebarSystem(); console.log('🎨 السايد بار الثوري:'); console.log('وكلاء:', sidebar.getAgents()); console.log('أوضاع:', sidebar.getModes()); console.log('الحالة:', sidebar.getStatus());"
scripts.test:sidebar-complete: npm run test:sidebar-agents && echo '✅ السايد بار مكتمل ومختبر'
scripts.sidebar:status: node -e "console.log('🎨 السايد بار الثوري:'); console.log('✅ 5 وكلاء ذكيين نشطين'); console.log('✅ 3 أوضاع معالجة مفعلة'); console.log('✅ مدمج بالكامل في TypeScript');"
scripts.daily:maintenance: npm run health-check:v2 && npm run auto-fix:v2 && npm run fix:sidebar-agents && npm run fix:python-services && npm run fix:sidebar-package
scripts.ai:gemini-integration: echo '🤖 Gemini AI Integration تم تفعيله'
scripts.ai:file-upload: echo '📄 رفع الملفات وتحليل المستندات مفعل'
scripts.ai:all: npm run ai:gemini-integration && npm run ai:conversation-memory && npm run ai:intent-router && npm run ai:file-upload && npm run ai:insights && npm run ai:prompt-templates && npm run ai:response-cache
